array.string: sysctl -w net.inet.ip.forwarding=1; echo "rdr pass inet proto tcp from any to self port {80,<%= httpPort %>} -> 127.0.0.1 port <%= httpPort %>\nrdr pass inet proto tcp from any to self port {443,<%= httpsProxyPort %>} -> 127.0.0.1 port <%= httpsProxyPort %>" | pfctl -a "com.apple/250.KatonFirewall" -Ef -
